title: Feature Request: Function to see at the Status LED if the Host does have an Authorized DNS Entry
author: Chrisu02
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
Status RED : Host is not Reachable.
Status Amber: Host is reachable but only with unauthorized adress (nslookup)
Satus Green: Hostname has an Authorized DNS entry

## Current Behavior
Red: Hostname is not available
Green: Hostname is available
